Possibly a handy example for those using (the excellent @benotist) to share presentations: ✍️ Manage your presentations on @notist 🥤 Slurp up you content via their JSON feeds 🤖 Generate event listings on your site with @eleven_ty 🌐 Serve on @netlify https://t.co/CXmebJ0qbx
